pkgmetadata.longdescription: Some Useful Functions from Spreadsheets and 'SPSS' Statistics // Package implements several popular functions from Excel ('COUNTIF', 'VLOOKUP', etc.) and 'SPSS' Statistics ('RECODE', 'COUNT', etc.). Also there are functions for basic tables with value labels/variable labels support. Package aimed to help people to move data processing from Excel/'SPSS' to R.
